arts.ttl: Lamine Yamal returns to full fitness in time for Sunday's clash with Real Sociedad
arts.sum: In a big update, Lamine Yamal has received the medical discharge, after recovering from his pubic discomfort, and is named in the squad for today’s match. The 18-year-old returns after missing the last four matches.

arts.ttl: Barcelona youngster’s availability for Real Sociedad clash currently ‘up in the air’ – report
arts.sum: According to Javi Miguel of AS, Barcelona midfielder Marc Casado’s availability for tomorrow’s game against Real Sociedad is currently ‘up in the air’. The 22-year-old midfielder failed to finish Saturday’s training session at the Ciutat Esportiva, as he was forced off with muscular discomfort.
